ui.choosePlan: Choose the Right Plan for You
ui.planDescription: Flexible pricing plans designed for your business size. Change anytime you want.
ui.pricingNote: All prices include VAT. Payment security is protected with SSL certificate.

hero.title: Choose the Right
hero.description: Flexible pricing options designed for your business size and needs. All plans start with a 15-day free trial.

faq.title: Frequently Asked
faq.subtitle: Everything you want to know about pricing

creditCard.question: Is a credit card required during the free trial period?
creditCard.answer: No, no payment information is required for the 15-day free trial. You can enter your payment details when you want to continue after the trial period.

planChange.question: How do I change my plan?
planChange.answer: You can change your plan anytime from your account settings. The price difference is automatically calculated when upgrading to a higher plan.

smsCredits.question: Can I carry over my SMS credits to the next month?
smsCredits.answer: SMS credits are carried over to the next month if unused. We support up to 3 months of accumulation.

cancellation.question: How do I cancel my subscription?
cancellation.answer: You can cancel your subscription from your account settings using the "Cancel Subscription" option or by calling our customer service. Your data will be kept for 30 days.

enterprise.question: Are there special discounts for enterprise packages?
enterprise.answer: We offer special pricing for customers with 5+ salon chains. You can get a quote by contacting our sales team.

cta.title: Have more questions?
cta.description: Our customer service team is happy to help you.
